history.proof: intros. unfold minus, zero, opp. scongruence use: plus_zero_r, opp_zero unfold: opp, zero.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of AbelianGroup.ax4 (AbelianGroup.plus _ _ _ (AbelianGroup.opp _ _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros G x. unfold minus, zero, opp. rewrite AbelianGroup.ax4.
